name: RUMP! - It's a Jump and Rump!
description: RUMP! It's a crazy and challenging 3D jump and run game with the most funny multiplayer racemode for you and your friends!
minimum_requirements: Processor: Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Quad Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
